title: The Bachelor's Sam and Snezana struggle to control their daughter on TV
text:
There's an old saying in television: 'Never work with children or animals.'

And it seems Bachelor couple Sam and Snezana Wood ignored that advice, as they brought their kids along for a live TV appearance on Tuesday.

While being interviewed via satellite on The Morning Show, the pair's daughters simply couldn't keep still.

Here comes trouble! The Bachelor's Sam and Snezana Wood struggled to control their two-year-old daughter Willow during a live interview on The Morning Show on Tuesday

Sam and Snezana each had a child in their lap as they tried to answer questions from hosts Larry Emdur and Sally Bowrey.

The interview didn't get off to a good start, as two-year-old Willow started talking and playing with the microphone lead.

'Oh we're tangled!' Sam said as he tried to pull the lead away from his daughter.

Oh, dear! Sam and Snezana each had a child in their lap as they tried to answer questions from The Morning Show hosts Larry Emdur and Sally Bowrey

As that unfolded, co-host Sarah said: 'That's what I love about kids and television, from the moment you start, you never know which way it's going to go!'

'Willow is very demanding at the moment,' responded Snezana, 38, as she tried her best to get the interview back on track.

But despite her best efforts, Willow continued to cause trouble in Seven's Melbourne studio as she squirmed out of her father's grip.

Sam has his hands full! The interview didn't get off to a good start, as Willow started talking and playing with the microphone lead

'She's demanding': Fortunately, 11-week-old Charlie Lane was slightly better behaved during her TV debut, but still kept trying to escape from her mother's arms

The 39-year-old personal trainer eventually gave up and told his daughter to go for a walk.

Fortunately, 11-week-old Charlie Lane was slightly better behaved during her TV debut, but still kept trying to escape from her mother's arms.

Sam and Snezana met on The Bachelor in 2015. Snezana also has an older daughter, 14-year-old Eve, from a previous marriage.
